item.title: How to learn Python Flask
item.description: Python flask is a micro-framework written in python. It is used for building web applications. TinkerHub donation page is an example for a web app made with flask Why learn Flask :question: Flask is a micro-framework. Means it is simple and can be extended to add more stuffs like database Simple as well as best option to build a backend for something you wrote in python - for example a ML model Install and setup stuffs :construction: Some of the things you need and need not for learning Flask

item.title: How to learn Django for Web Developmentüêç
item.description: “The web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.” :sparkles: Learning path for Django curated by Irene:bowtie: Why learn Django :question: Django is a popular web framework built on top of python. It helps programmers rapidly create maintainable and flexiable web applications powered by an SQL Database. Django takes care of much of the hassle of web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. It is free and open source, has a thriving and active community, great documentation, and many options for free and paid-for support.
